scripts.index-mock-data: curl -H "Content-Type: application/x-ndjson" -XPOST -u "elastic:$(kubectl get secret elasticsearch-query-elasticsearch-e70e9b6b-es-elastic-user -o go-template='{{.data.elastic | base64decode}}')" "http://127.0.0.1:9200/cdk/library/_bulk" --data-binary @sample-data.txt
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run test && npm run synth
